page.title: 10Employment in Rochford Area.
page.content: Approximately 20% of the people who live in the Rochford area have a managerial or a professional job. 50% have manual jobs, some skilled and some semi-skilled. The rest are somewhere between the two. A lot of people in the area go to London to work. Some travel by train (Rochford or Hockley Stations) and some travel by car or even coach. About 20% of the population work in London. The rest of the people, unless they are unemployed, work mainly in Essex. Nearly 25% go to work in Southend which is three to four miles away, depending on where you live. Another nearly 10% work in Basildon where there are many big industries, including the Ford Motor Company. Basildon is approximately eight miles away. These people travel either by public transport or use their own car.
